verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: قُلْ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ اسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِنَ الْجِنِّ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْآنًا عَجَبًا
verses.verseStringB: Say, “It was revealed to me that a group of jinn listened in, and said, ‘We have heard a wondrous Recitation.

verses.verseString: يَهْدِي إِلَى الرُّشْدِ فَآمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ وَلَنْ نُشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَا أَحَدًا
verses.verseStringB: It guides to sound judgment, so we have believed in it, and we will never associate anyone with our Lord.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُ تَعَالَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا اتَّخَذَ صَاحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And He—exalted be the Grandeur of our Lord—never had a spouse, nor a child.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى اللَّهِ شَطَطًا
verses.verseStringB: But the fools among us used to say nonsense about Allah.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَنْ لَنْ تَقُولَ الْإِنْسُ وَالْجِنُّ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا
verses.verseStringB: And we had thought that humans and jinn would never speak lies about Allah.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِنَ الْإِنْسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِنَ الْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
verses.verseStringB: And some individual humans used to seek power through some individual jinn, but they only increased them in confusion.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا كَمَا ظَنَنْتُمْ أَنْ لَنْ يَبْعَثَ اللَّهُ أَحَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And they thought, as you thought, that Allah would resurrect no one.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا السَّمَاءَ فَوَجَدْنَاهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
verses.verseStringB: And we probed the heaven, and we found it filled with fierce guards and projectiles.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَاعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَنْ يَسْتَمِعِ الْآنَ يَجِدْ لَهُ شِهَابًا رَصَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And we used to take up positions to listen in, but whoever listens now finds a flare lying in wait for him.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِي أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَنْ فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And we do not know whether ill is intended for those on earth, or whether their Lord intends guidance for them.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الصَّالِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَائِقَ قِدَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And among us are the righteous, but some of us are otherwise. We follow divergent paths.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَنْ لَنْ نُعْجِزَ اللَّهَ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَنْ نُعْجِزَهُ هَرَبًا
verses.verseStringB: And we knew for certain that we could never thwart Allah on earth; nor could we ever thwart Him by fleeing.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا الْهُدَىٰ آمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ فَمَنْ يُؤْمِنْ بِرَبِّهِ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
verses.verseStringB: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. Whoever believes in his Lord fears neither denial nor burden.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُولَٰئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا رَشَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And among us are the submitters, and among us are the deviant. As for those who have submitted—it is they who have attained Right Guidance.

verses.verseString: وَأَمَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
verses.verseStringB: But as for the unjust—they will be fuel for Hell.’”

verses.verseString: وَأَنْ لَوِ اسْتَقَامُوا عَلَى الطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَاهُمْ مَاءً غَدَقًا
verses.verseStringB: And had they kept true to the Path, We would have given them abundant water to drink.

verses.verseString: لِنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَنْ يُعْرِضْ عَنْ ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
verses.verseStringB: To test them with it. Whoever turns away from his Lord's remembrance, He will direct him to torment ever mounting.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّ الْمَسَاجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ أَحَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And the places of worship are for Allah. So do not call, besides Allah, upon anyone else.

verses.verseString: وَأَنَّهُ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ اللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
verses.verseStringB: And when Allah's servant stood up calling on Him, they almost fell on him in a mass.

verses.verseString: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَدْعُو رَبِّي وَلَا أُشْرِكُ بِهِ أَحَدًا
verses.verseStringB: Say, “I pray only to my Lord, and I never associate anyone with Him.”

verses.verseString: قُلْ إِنِّي لَا أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
verses.verseStringB: Say, “It is not in my power to harm you, nor to bring you to right conduct.”

verses.verseString: قُلْ إِنِّي لَنْ يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ اللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِنْ دُونِهِ مُلْتَحَدًا
verses.verseStringB: Say, “None will protect me from Allah; and I will find no refuge, except in Him.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا بَلَاغًا مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرِسَالَاتِهِ ۚ وَمَنْ يَعْصِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ فَإِنَّ لَهُ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا
verses.verseStringB: Except for a proclamation from Allah and His messages. Whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger—for him is the Fire of Hell, remaining in it forever.”

verses.verseString: حَتَّىٰ إِذَا رَأَوْا مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
verses.verseStringB: Until, when they see what they were promised, they will know who is weaker in helpers, and fewer in number.

verses.verseString: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِي أَقَرِيبٌ مَا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُ رَبِّي أَمَدًا
verses.verseStringB: Say, “I do not know whether what you are promised is near, or if my Lord will extend it for a period.”

verses.verseString: عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِ أَحَدًا
verses.verseStringB: The Knower of the invisible; He does not disclose His Unseen to anyone.

verses.verseString: إِلَّا مَنِ ارْتَضَىٰ مِنْ رَسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُ يَسْلُكُ مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِ رَصَدًا
verses.verseStringB: Except to a Messenger of His choosing. He then dispatches guards in front of him, and behind him.

verses.verseString: لِيَعْلَمَ أَنْ قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا رِسَالَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ عَدَدًا
verses.verseStringB: So that He may know that they have conveyed their Lord’s message. He surrounds whatsoever is with them, and He has tallied everything by number.
